last_episode_to_air.name: Cinderella Tuna
last_episode_to_air.overview: A perfect storm hits Gloucester, pitting man versus nature as Captains Johnny Johnson Jr. and Danny Jr. hunt for a final score. With time running out, Danny Jr. lands a jumbo tuna that may save his family's season.

name: All on the Line
overview: Follow two Atlantic Bluefin Tuna fishing boats in the iconic fishing town of Gloucester, Massachusetts, discovering the special dynamic between these two groups and their unique ability to band together in an industry that otherwise demands fierce, sometimes cutthroat, competition.
